DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effects of 3 blood pressure drugs, called angiotensin receptor blockers, on the blood pressure control systems in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: The Relative Effects of Olmesartan Medoxomil, Irbesartan and Valsartan on the Activity of the Blood Pressure Control System in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men and women between the ages of 18 to 65 In good health Any serious health problems Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B and C History of drug and alcohol abuse
